user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfort and support in my undergarments, ensuring that I could wear them throughout the day without discomfort while also looking good.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a comfortable and supportive undergarment that I could wear all day without discomfort. The key attributes that attracted me were the soft stretch fabric, the seamless design, and the adjustable features that promised a customizable fit. The idea of a wireless bra that still provided lift and support was particularly appealing, as I wanted something that would enhance my shape naturally while being easy to wear under various outfits.

My main motivation for this purchase was the promise of comfort and support. The product description highlighted features like moisture-wicking fabric and targeted support, which were important to me. I was also influenced by the positive feedback from other customers, indicating that this bra was the most comfortable they had ever worn. The combination of practical features and strong customer reviews made it an easy choice for me.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are comfortable, lightweight, and made from high-quality materials. I value items that offer a good fit and allow for ease of movement, particularly in clothing and footwear. Quick-drying fabrics and breathable materials are also important to me, as they enhance comfort during wear. Additionally, I appreciate products that are versatile and can be used in various settings, whether for casual outings or active days. On the other hand, I tend to dislike items that are uncomfortable, poorly made, or do not meet my expectations in terms of quality. I have a strong aversion to products that feel cheap or do not provide adequate support, especially in footwear and undergarments.

conversation.content: I want comfortable and supportive undergarments that look good. within my expected price range: [20.78, 22.0]
What specific style or type of undergarments do you prefer, such as briefs, boxers, thongs, or others?
I prefer bras that are comfortable and supportive for all-day wear.
What size range are you looking for in the bras for all-day wear?
I prefer bras in the size range that provides both comfort and support for all-day wear.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Bali Lace Desire Wireless Bra, Full-Coverage Wirefree Bra, ComfortFlex Fit Convertible Bra for Everyday Wear> / Item ID: B071KQC71Y / Price: $18.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If you're looking for a lacy, wireless, full-coverage bra that offers sublimely comfortable support, look no further. The Lace Desire® bra is designed with Bali's ComfortFlex® Fit system for a perfect fit from sizes S-2XL. Wirefree cups provide full coverage and are lightly lined to shape and support. Gorgeous open lace covers the entire style and even extends above and below the cups. The no-slip straps are easily adjustable and also designed to convert to a crisscross back with the simple J-hook that's included for wearing flexibility. This bra really does offer the best of everything."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Exquisite Form 5100531 Fully Wireless Cotton Back & Posture Support Bra> / Item ID: B000E0V532 / Price: $18.95 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['Since 1945, we at Exquisite Form have made it our signature mission to design lingerie for you, the real woman who comes in all shapes and sizes. We\'ve understood for a long time that full-figured women "need a fuller bra, not a bigger bra." That\'s why we\'ve designed our FULLY bras to have targeted innovative features, like powernet support frames, extra support undercups, and stretch sides. Available in extended sizes, our FULLY collection features wireless and underwire bras, longlines, posture bras, minimizer bras, bras with lined cups, padded straps and everything in between. Whether you need a fuller fit or more support, you\'ll find a FULLY bra to fit your needs. In every stitch, there is a promise of fit, durability, and quality. A promise we\'ve kept for over 70 years.'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <JUST MY SIZE Women's Pure Comfort Front Close Wirefree Bra MJ1274> / Item ID: B07S3LQ9NQ / Price: $17.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If you thought it was impossible to find the support you need with the comfort you deserve, think again. JMS® presents their Pure Comfort® wireless, full-coverage bra that has everything you want in a bra. It starts with the remarkably comfortable yet effective light support, achieved with smartly engineered strategic support zones and a wider, no-roll knit underband for subtle under bust shaping. You'll love the convenience and ease of the front-close styling, with plush cushioning under the hook-and-eye panel for no-dig comfort. The seamless design gives you the sleek, smooth look you want under T-shirts and other clingy clothes. Wider straps and a built-up back help smooth away bulges even more. Plus, this wire-free tee shirt bra is made with moisture-wicking fabric that helps to keep you cool and dry all day. Made with 4-way stretch that moves effortlessly with you, there's a lot to love in this front-close wirefree bra from JMS."]

Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes ComfortFlex Fit Women's Oh So Light Wireless Bra with Comfort Foam, Full-Coverage T-Shirt Bra (S-3XL), MHG521> / Item ID: B08L6CWW3F / Price: $16.1 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Customers say that Hanes® Oh So Light wireless bra is so soft and lightweight that it's almost like wearing no bra at all, other than the flexible support. This sublime comfort starts with silky ComfortFlex Fit® fabric with 4-way stretch that molds effortlessly to your shape. It continues with the flexible, lightly lined foam cups that gently shape and support. Additionally, this ultra-light T-shirt bra is designed with a stay-in-place comfort band that further enhances support. You'll love how this wirefree, full-coverage bra disappears under clothes, and you'll appreciate the lightweight mesh back for airy comfort. And wait, there's more! Convertible straps offer fashion flexibility and tagless styling provides itch-free comfort."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's SmoothTec ComfortFlex Fit Wirefree Bra MHG199> / Item ID: B01HRFT6YQ / Price: $12.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Welcome to a wireless world where you never have to sacrifice comfort for support. Hanes® Smooth Comfort® wireless bra is brilliantly constructed for both. Carefully shaped foam cups and Hanes®' stay-in-place SmoothTec® band provide all the support you need, with the brand's ComfortFlex Fit® fabric that molds to your shape, not the other way around. One of the best features of this wirefree convertible bra is the Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture to keep you cool and dry all day. This seamless, wireless bra provides full coverage with a flattering sweetheart neckline. You'll also appreciate the smooth cups and seamless construction that make this an ideal T-shirt bra. One more handy design detail is the convertible straps that offer two ways to wear for fashion flexibility."]
